response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to us both. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business. Considering its true worth and the potential it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product from me at a special price of $1,150,000. This is an exceptional deal, designed to ensure that we both benefit from this transaction. I look forward to discussing the details with you and hope to facilitate a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 1150000}
